new comment 3267813 (near 2637, Central Hungary, 2637, Hungary) / * 2024 March 6 06:52 aceman444 Updated: No, it is not a rendering issue. It is intentional rendering at osm.org, of there is forest an meadow at the same place, then both trees and meadow are rendered. If there are should be no trees then the area of the meadow needs to be cut out of the multipolygon. / There are cases where both should be rendered, e.g. some swamp areas with trees inside a lake. / I will not open notes for each meadow, but try to fix more than just the one meadow I pointed out. There are many wrong meadows in this area so please try to clean them up. / You can see wrong (not 'inner' members) polygons like https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/715104976 , https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/1020104401 , https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/1040342661 , https://www.openstreetmap.org/way/715102653 and many others.

reactivated note 3267813 (near 2637, Central Hungary, 2637, Hungary) / * 2022 July 15 06:26 aceman444 Created: Many of the meadows missing as inner members of the forest multipolygon. / * 2023 May 2 10:12 urbalazs Resolved: Looks good now. / * 2023 August 11 16:14 aceman444 Reactivated: / * 2023 August 11 16:15 aceman444 Updated: No, nothing has changed and the data is still wrong. Forests still span over meadows. / * 2024 March 3 12:25 tregec Updated: Van ilyen szabály, hogy egy rét az erdőpoligon belső tagja kell legyen? / * 2024 March 5 17:05 infeeeee Resolved: Updated: https://www.openstreetmap.org/changeset/148259730 / But this shouldn't be necessary, it sounds like a rendering issue. Please don't open a new issue for each meadow. / * 2024 March 6 06:46 aceman444 Reactivated:

closed note 4132242 (near 1016, Tabán, 1st district) / * 2024 February 29 07:23 ITineris Created: Innen a Hegyalja útig sok minden változott: Az egyenesen menő helyett az Attila út felől jövő kapott elsőbbségadás kötelező táblát. A sávok kiosztása is változott; van, ahol a kettőből az egyiket lezárták. / * 2024 March 5 13:11 infeeeee Resolved: Elsőbbségadást átraktam: https://www.openstreetmap.org/changeset/148250012 / Szerintem a sávok jól vannak, azt már itt korábban frissítettem, de előfordulhat, hogy valamit nem vettem észre.
